Paragraph.Text: Develop a plan for statewide implementation of the developmental evaluation and intervention program.
Develop rules, procedures, and contracts to implement the developmental evaluation and intervention program.

Subsection.Text: The Department of Education, in cooperation with the Department of Health, shall:

Paragraph.Text: Develop an educational management program for hearing-impaired infants.
Develop an involvement program for parents or guardians of hearing-impaired infants.
